/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the intersection. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings lining the street are a mix of modern and traditional architecture, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a typical day in this vibrant city.
